ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Research Associate Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 09:28 IST
 Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 73,660 to 73,660




FOLLOW

The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., M.Tech., Ph.D, and M.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Maharashtra.

ACTREC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Research Associate 	01	M.Sc, M.Tech, Ph.D, M.Pharm

Age Limit for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.

Selection Process for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 73,660 /- per month.

Application fee for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Research Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the interview at the address given below.

Venue

Meeting Room II, 3rd Floor, Khanolkar Shodhika, ACTREC, Kharghar, Navi Mumbai -410210

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	28-08-2025
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
